definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: He was surprised when he stole an exhibit from the museum.
sentences.chinese: 当他从博物馆偷盗一件展品时被当场捉住。

sentences.english: The most unique finds, however, are those in the “folk-lore” section of the museum.
sentences.chinese: 最特别的发现是博物馆里“民间文学”展区的展品。

sentences.english: They strolled though the market, his bibliophilic eye studying the wares.
sentences.chinese: 他们漫步地穿过市场，他藏书者的眼睛研究着展品。

sentences.english: They have good exhibits and fascinating displays.
sentences.chinese: 它们有许多优良的陈列品和吸引人的展品。

sentences.english: You may come in and take a look at our exhibits in the show-room, if you please.
sentences.chinese: 您可以进来看看我们的展品。

sentences.english: Forklift vehicle used to transport heavy exhibit materials short distance and for loading and unloading materials.
sentences.chinese: 铲车，主要用于重量大展品装卸和短距离移动。

sentences.english: Exact name of item, Model of machine, quantity, unit price.
sentences.chinese: 展品的品名，机器型号，数量，及单价。

sentences.english: The exhibits were arranged according to schools.
sentences.chinese: 展品是依照流派陈列的。

sentences.english: Carnival of Carnivals will bring together examples of carnivals from interested towns.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节的展品可以提供给其他感兴趣的城市模范作用。

sentences.english: Exhibits in museums are often displayed in glass cases.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆中的展品常摆放在玻璃橱里。

sentences.english: The works are instructive, often beautiful and occasionally thrilling.
sentences.chinese: 这些精美绝伦的展品颇具启发性，有的甚至令人震撼。

sentences.english: The new building of the museum has thousands of historic exhibits.
sentences.chinese: 这个博物馆的新建筑内有数以千计的历史展品。

sentences.english: For selected items, there are videos featuring discussions by expert curators.
sentences.chinese: 对一些精选展品内容，还配有文史专家的讨论视频。

sentences.english: The display was wreathed in/with laurel.
sentences.chinese: 展品周围环绕着月桂树叶。

sentences.english: Visitors are requested not to touch the exhitrifles.
sentences.chinese: 条件参观者不可触摸展品。

definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
to lay out one's products/to display
